pageContext.claim: “Have you been watching what has been going on with the inspector general's report -- what a scam this whole thing is? OK, how guilty is [Hillary Clinton] … no matter what she did, no matter how many crimes she's committed, which were numerous, they wanted her to be innocent.”
pageContext.analysis: The president is referring to FBI agents who sent anti-Trump text messages in 2016, including one that said "we'll stop" Trump's election. The DOJ inspector general's report found fault with the conduct of several FBI officials leading up to the 2016 election. But the report also concluded that "no bias or other improper consideration was found in the FBI’s decisions or actions."
